page.title: 05Hamilton Grounds Farm
page.content: {Mr Kirk}is a farmer. His farm is called{Hamilton Grounds Farm.}He rents his land from the{Pochin Estate}- a major land-owner in the area, and from the{Sun Alliance Assurance Company.} Some years ago this company helped the Pochins with a problem and took over ownership of some of their land. The Kirks are{mixed farmers}- they have cows for milk and grow potatoes, beans and grass for silage and hay. They grow{Maris Piper}potatoes for chips, and also{Desiree.}Many of the potatoes are sold to local fish and chip shops or directly to the public. The farm is about 280 hectares - 24 hectares of oats, 64 of barley, 108 of wheat 12 of beans, and 10 hectares of potatoes. The remaining 62 hectares are grass for grazing and silage or hay. Mr Kirk has 86 cows producing 1700 litres daily.
